traits.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

traits.name: Heart of Hruggek
entries: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, {@condition stunned}, or put to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage at range.
